name: Maslach Burnout Inventory
interpretation: Emotional exhaustion is considered as the main component of burnout and manifests itself in a reduced emotional background, indifference or emotional saturation. Depersonalization affects the deformation of relationships with other people. In some cases, this may be an increase in dependence on others. In others, the strengthening of negative, cynical attitudes and feelings toward recipients: patients, clients, etc. Reduction of professional achievements may occur either in the trend negatively evaluate themselves to underestimate their professional achievements and successes, negativism to business advantages and opportunities, either in the understatement of self-esteem, limiting their opportunities, responsibilities to others
